channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Biden gets hero’s welcome. And, protesters pull down fencing to get into the DNC
item.description: The DNC kicks off today in Chicago with Biden as the keynote speaker. Here's what to expect at the convention. And, Trump plans to steal the spotlight this week with a number of rallies planned.
item.content:encoded:
The DNC kicks off today in Chicago with Biden as the keynote speaker. Here's what to expect at the convention. And, Trump plans to steal the spotlight this week with a number of rallies planned.

(Image credit: Kevin Dietsch)
item.dc:creator: Brittney Melton

item.title: Protesters show up at DNC to oppose U.S. back for Israel in its war in Gaza
item.description: Some people regard these protests as a kind of test for Chicago police, which has been under pressure in recent years to reform. How did they do on their first full day of the convention?
item.content:encoded: Some people regard these protests as a kind of test for Chicago police, which has been under pressure in recent years to reform. How did they do on their first full day of the convention?
item.dc:creator: Martin Kaste

item.title: Pete Buttigieg, who ran for the president nomination in 2020, to speak at the DNC
item.description: NPR's Steve Inskeep talks with Democrat Pete Buttigieg about President Biden's legacy, and the goals and strategies of the Democratic National Convention.
item.content:encoded: NPR's Steve Inskeep talks with Democrat Pete Buttigieg about President Biden's legacy, and the goals and strategies of the Democratic National Convention.
item.dc:creator: Steve Inskeep

item.title: The White House plan to stop companies from wasting our time
item.description: The Biden-Harris administration has a new initiative called "Time Is Money."
item.content:encoded: The Biden-Harris administration has a new initiative called "Time Is Money."
item.dc:creator: Greg Rosalsky

item.title: 'Republicans for Harris' coalitions have launched in several swing states
item.description: The members want to galvanize support for Vice President Harris among Republicans wary of former President Donald Trump, but are reluctant to vote against the party they’ve long belonged to.
item.content:encoded: The members want to galvanize support for Vice President Harris among Republicans wary of former President Donald Trump, but are reluctant to vote against the party they’ve long belonged to.

item.title: America’s first second gentleman gets his turn on center stage tonight
item.description: As Vice President Harris tries to become the first female president, her husband, Doug Emhoff would make history too — as the first, first gentleman.
item.content:encoded:
As Vice President Harris tries to become the first female president, her husband, Doug Emhoff would make history too — as the first, first gentleman.

(Image credit: Chip Somodevilla)
item.dc:creator: Deepa Shivaram

item.title: Tim Walz made an impression in China, students and teachers say
item.description: Vice President Harris’ running mate has lived in China and traveled there many times. His relationship with the country has been under scrutiny, especially from Republicans.
item.content:encoded:
Vice President Harris’ running mate has lived in China and traveled there many times. His relationship with the country has been under scrutiny, especially from Republicans.

(Image credit: Mario Tama)
item.dc:creator: John Ruwitch

item.title: After Taylor Swift canceled 3 shows in Vienna, there's been little blowback from fans
item.description: Fans who traveled hundreds of miles to see the pop superstar are asking for another opportunity to see her in concert. The concerts who canceled because of terror threats.
item.content:encoded: Fans who traveled hundreds of miles to see the pop superstar are asking for another opportunity to see her in concert. The concerts who canceled because of terror threats.
item.dc:creator: Maria Aspan

item.title: Blinken heads to Egypt and Qatar to try to seal Gaza cease-fire deal
item.description: Secretary of State Antony Blinken says Israel has agreed to a cease-fire proposal for the war in Gaza. That announcement came after he met with Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyhu in Jerusalem.
item.content:encoded: Secretary of State Antony Blinken says Israel has agreed to a cease-fire proposal for the war in Gaza. That announcement came after he met with Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyhu in Jerusalem.
item.dc:creator: Kat Lonsdorf

item.title: Why Trump is lavishing praise on Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban
item.description: European Union leaders shun Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban, but he enjoys a friendly relationship with former President Donald Trump.
item.content:encoded: European Union leaders shun Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban, but he enjoys a friendly relationship with former President Donald Trump.
item.dc:creator: Teri Schultz
